message: Let's start with a fair division. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but it's just the beginning!
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm offering you a generous 350,000$. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up on a fair share. Let's split it 60/40.  Remember, with each round, we both lose more!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you almost half!  Let's end this before we both lose even more to inflation.
